name: taglist
desc: Provides a nice interface to browse tags in a file

name: blogit
desc: Wordpress integration w/ vim. Supports posts in Markdown.

name: calendar
desc: Displays a calendar, also provides support for keeping a journal.

name: markdown
desc: Provides syntax and snippets for Markdown.

name: timestamp
desc: Shortcuts to put timestamps in a buffer.

name: vimwiki
desc: A wiki to manage notes in vim. Also comes with a diary.
